title: Game Graphics is getting heavier with next textures
body:
Hi Riot,

Can you pls make the textures simpler instead of more complex?
The game is getting heavier, sometimes when I click the map to move it doesnt register.
This happens in the current 5.2 patch.

My settings for Video and Interface are set at Very Low.
Each settings is set to get best performance

Please advise

replies.body:
"You may want to upgrade your graphics card."

I liked it better when they were more straight-forward about it, not these days were they're like "optimization" and "different tier settings".

Unfortunately this is just the way they're going. What are you rough computer specs? Maybe we could get it going a bit faster.

Windows 7 Ultimate SP 1
Intel R Core TM i5-3317U CPU @ 1.7GHz 1.7 GHz
4.00GB RAM
64-bit OS

How can I view my graphics card?
I increase my FPS from 25 FPS to 120 FPS, it is far better now. I dont feel the lag.. and start carrying again =)

Aha, yeah. It's mostly down to your graphics card. If you press Winkey+R and type in "dxdiag", and then click on the "Display" tab, it will tell you the name of your graphics card, along with various other details.

And how did you improve the performance on your machine?

Thanks Horse of Force

Here is my DxDiag Display data:

Intel R HD Graphics 4000
Chip Type: Intel R HD Graphics Family
DAC Type: Internal
1696 Total Memory
Monitor: Generic PnP Monitor

Drivers version 9.17.10
Date: 12/12/2012
WHQL Logo'd: Yes
DDI Version: 11
Driver Model: WDDM 1.1


To improve my performance, I just set everything in game to be low quality

Really? That sounds like a no-brainer :P.

But yeah, you might wanna do things like defrag and clean your registry every once in a while. Could save you some frames later on.

PS. It's mainly shadows that slow down old hardware.

Apparently changing FPS does not solve it completely. It still lags, especially if they have champions with high-graphics spells such as Lux or Reksai tunnels.
In addition, what I do right now is turning off LolClient.exe in game. The ingame program is League of Legends.exe. For some unknown reason, LolClient.exe eats 500kb memory in game.

I have cleaned my registry and currently defragmenting.
I will keep you updated, hopefully this works.

Note: If its about teamfight with all the booms and bangs, I usually give it up, since I lag completely I cant even use Zhonya despite spam-click my number 4. Maybe this game is best for PC not for notebook.

>500kb

Think you meant 500mb. That's what it does on my computer, at least.

Remember to not let it overheat! Also, giving the process priority might give you an improvement.

Ohey I am not alone

See the post by Xemidan here:
http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/2ty02g/52_patch_bugs_megathread/
That could mean it's going to be fixed by Riot. I hope that's the case.

The latest patch today has fixed this bug.
Starting rekt-ing enemy team again
Thank you Horse of Force for your accompany =)

I have put High Priority. I have defrag it. I have cleaned registry, also turned the ingame volume to mute.
It is still there.

I kinda give up.
I feel like a player that only hopes to get carried with this lag. Feel like bronze v.

I think I will stop playing until I get a PC.
This is stupid. I miss the previous simple textures over this.

I lost so many games because of this.
Rito please...
